summary:
Adds an Ashlander follower and home to the island of Solstheim.
Requires Dragonborn.
descriptionHtml:
Requires DRAGONBORN DLC!
This mod adds a new Ashlander Follower and a home to the island of Solstheim.
He can be recruited by going to the new home where you will find him inside, the home is near the Silt Strider on Solstheim.
He is a lvl 30 Spellsword.
He can also use a bow.
(The new Bow, Sword and arrows are still being finished off and will come in the next update).

I hope you enjoy,
if you have any problems post them in the comment section.

Credits:
Me (JDcrafter) for making the mod.
Bethesda for their great game and Modding tool.
author: JDcrafter
